resource.valueString: Not sure, but I have tried everything.

coding.display: How often have Pain relievers (such as Advil, Aleve, Aspirin, Ibuprofen, Motrin, Tylenol) you can buy without a prescription from your doctor that you have used in the last 6 months helped with your pain?

Wed like to know more about you and your goals.

resource.valueString: These are my goals for a pain-free environment. Get up every morning and have a great day with no back spasms and no hip pain and no aches and pains throughout my whole body.

coding.display: Wed like to know more about you and your goals.

resource.valueString: My barriers to a pain free life are 1.  It is impossible. 2. I am too lazy to exercise.  3. I am overweight.  4. I am too old to change now.

resource.valueString: I don't have any questions about the video.

resource.valueString: I visited the site. No questions.
